{author:"A Fisherman of Tyre",title:"Epitaph of Tyre",resolved:1b,pages:["Curse you, righteous fool.

He told me you would come, and he told me to write this for you.

I say blast him, blast you.

It's your fault, isn't it? Your fault that this won't work? I know so.","Well then, 'hero', or whatever you are, know that I have already made MY sacrifice by the time you get here. My name will be remembered alongside yours. If I have my way, your name will be the one enshadowed.

I am a fisherman of Tyre. Before you lies","my Disgraceful Beast.

Oh, I do hope it hurts you dearly.

No luck for you."]}
